duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide high-quality customer service and technical support for payroll systems and processes.
Work directly with business users, payroll managers, and vendors to define functional requirements for technical solutions.
Manage and audit master data as well as daily support of SAP HR, testing, and performance issues.
Analyze and resolve errors and discrepancies between HR systems and payroll to ensure accurate system status prior to processing.
Ensure documentation is up to date and compliant with company policies and legal requirements.
Act as a backup or additional resource for audits, error handling, and payroll processing in different regions.
Handle confidential data and demonstrate a strong understanding of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration, Statistics, Software Engineering, Computer Science, or related field and/or at least 5 years of relevant experience.
